00014 #include "config.h"
00015 
00016 #ifndef STACK_OR_HEAP_H
00017 #define STACK_OR_HEAP_H
00018 
00024 template<int stacksize, class T> class StackOrHeap {
00025 public:
00027    StackOrHeap( int size ) {
00028       if ( size > stacksize ) {
00029          m_deleteBuf = new T[ size ];
00030          m_useBuf = m_deleteBuf;
00031       } else {
00032          m_useBuf = m_stackBuf;
00033          m_deleteBuf = NULL;
00034       }
00035    }
00036 
00038    ~StackOrHeap() {
00039       delete [] m_deleteBuf;
00040    }
00041    
00042    operator T*() { return m_useBuf; }
00043 
00044    operator const T*() const { return m_useBuf; }
00045 private:
00046    T m_stackBuf[stacksize];
00047    T* m_deleteBuf;
00048    T* m_useBuf;
00049 };
00050 
00051 #endif
